taxize
  • Reference
  • Articles

Aggregate data by given taxonomic rank

Aggregate data by given taxonomic rank

rankagg(data = NULL, datacol = NULL, rank = NULL, fxn = "sum")

Arguments

data
A data.frame. Column headers must have capitalized ranks (e.g., Genus, Tribe, etc.) (data.frame)
datacol
The data column (character)
rank
Taxonomic rank to aggregate by (character)
fxn
Arithmetic function or vector or functions (character)

Examples

library("vegan")
#> Loading required package: permute
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘permute’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:devtools’:
#> 
#>     check
#> Loading required package: lattice
#> This is vegan 2.4-2
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘vegan’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:taxize’:
#> 
#>     taxa2dist
data(dune.taxon, package='vegan')
dat <- dune.taxon
set.seed(1234)
dat$abundance <- round(rlnorm(n=nrow(dat),meanlog=5,sdlog=2),0)
rankagg(data=dat, datacol="abundance", rank="Genus")
#>             Genus   sum
#> 1        Achillea    13
#> 2        Agrostis   258
#> 3            Aira  1298
#> 4      Alopecurus     1
#> 5    Anthoxanthum   350
#> 6          Bellis   408
#> 7   Brachythecium   144
#> 8          Bromus    47
#> 9  Calliergonella    23
#> 10    Chenopodium    50
#> 11        Cirsium    48
#> 12        Comarum    25
#> 13     Eleocharis    57
#> 14         Elymus    20
#> 15       Empetrum    31
#> 16    Hypochaeris   169
#> 17         Juncus  1130
#> 18         Lolium    53
#> 19       Plantago    24
#> 20            Poa 18642
#> 21     Ranunculus   194
#> 22          Rumex    56
#> 23         Sagina    61
#> 24          Salix   372
#> 25 Scorzoneroides    37
#> 26      Trifolium   476
#> 27          Vicia    19
rankagg(data=dat, "abundance", rank="Family")
#>              Family   sum
#> 1     Amaranthaceae    50
#> 2        Asteraceae   675
#> 3  Brachytheciaceae   144
#> 4   Caryophyllaceae    61
#> 5        Cyperaceae    57
#> 6         Ericaceae    31
#> 7          Fabaceae   495
#> 8         Hypnaceae    23
#> 9         Juncaceae  1130
#> 10   Plantaginaceae    24
#> 11          Poaceae 20669
#> 12     Polygonaceae    56
#> 13    Ranunculaceae   194
#> 14         Rosaceae    25
#> 15       Salicaceae   372
rankagg(data=dat, "abundance", rank="Genus", fxn="mean")
#>             Genus mean
#> 1        Achillea   13
#> 2        Agrostis  258
#> 3            Aira 1298
#> 4      Alopecurus    1
#> 5    Anthoxanthum  350
#> 6          Bellis  408
#> 7   Brachythecium  144
#> 8          Bromus   47
#> 9  Calliergonella   23
#> 10    Chenopodium   50
#> 11        Cirsium   48
#> 12        Comarum   25
#> 13     Eleocharis   57
#> 14         Elymus   20
#> 15       Empetrum   31
#> 16    Hypochaeris  169
#> 17         Juncus  565
#> 18         Lolium   53
#> 19       Plantago   24
#> 20            Poa 9321
#> 21     Ranunculus  194
#> 22          Rumex   56
#> 23         Sagina   61
#> 24          Salix  372
#> 25 Scorzoneroides   37
#> 26      Trifolium  238
#> 27          Vicia   19
rankagg(data=dat, "abundance", rank="Subclass")
#>      Subclass   sum
#> 1     Bryidae   167
#> 2 Magnoliidae 23839
rankagg(data=dat, "abundance", rank="Subclass", fxn="sd")
#>      Subclass         sd
#> 1     Bryidae   85.55992
#> 2 Magnoliidae 3494.49355
